Reviews.Title: What do you expect for the money???
Reviews.Author: Christopher Beach
Reviews.Content: I ordered the camera for my girlfriend.  It was basically purchased for her social outdoor activities.  It was never intended for any "real" photography.  We weren't expecting much out of any camera in this price range, and weren't too surprised.  The delay from the time you pull the trigger to the time that the camera actually captures the image is staggering.  You really have to anticipate what you are shooting.  Expect to hold a pose for quite awhile when usung this camera.  The navigation for the features is less than intuitive.  It takes awhile to get use to the menues and submenues. This is coming from a person who has had four previous Olympus cameras. The image quality is decent if you have good lighting.  Anything less, expect blur.  That being said, for the money, it is a good camera.  The 5x of opitcal zoom is useful. Also, the camera came with a micro sd adapter, which in itself has value if you are not ready to commit to the XD cards.  The batteries are a nice change to the Olympus cameras that I am use to.  It's nice to have AA's.  This allows flexibilty for powering. It also keeps it mobile for travel.  No chargers to lug around if you don't want to.  My previous cameras required Olympus's propietary batteries, which meant not only do you need to travel with that added equipment, but you also had at least an hour of downtime to recharge if you didn't want to spent the extra money on a spare pack. The AA's are readly available with a rechargable option if desired.  On alkaline batteries, the life was good for about 50 images with alot of flashing and zoom adjustments.  Obviously lithium batteries offer even more performance.

Reviews.Title: Wish I invested a little more for better camera
Reviews.Author: R. Bare
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera for my 12 year old for Christmas b/c she was always using mine.  I thought that the Olympus would be a great choice since I loved my Olympus 35mm.  With the price being reasonable, I didn't hesitate.  I wish I did.  My daughter liked the color of the camera, and that was about it.  The pictures are blurry, dark, and take many seconds to get to memory.  It is almost like the camera freezes for about 5-8 seconds before you can take another picture.  At first we just used the xd memory card that came with it (holds only about 3 pictures), just to test it out.  Then we thought that we would ofcourse go ahead and get the 2mg memory card (this is the highest they offer), to see if that made a difference.  It did not.  Needless to say, we are sending it back to Amazon.  Hopefully for a full refund.  I do not know how all that works since I have never returned anything.  If a full refund is granted, I will be looking at investing a little more for the Canon Powershot SD1200 -- and hopefully, have more success.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Beautiful Mind 504
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to use on my upcoming vacation. I'm very pleased thus far. This is an easy to use camera with great picture quality. I was also impressed by the value price I paid for 12 megapixels. I would recommend this camera for purchase. You will be very pleased.

Reviews.Title: good bargain
Reviews.Author: M. Green "minuteman29"
Reviews.Content: The perfect camera for a first time digital camera owner.  It is very easy to use and the price was outstanding compared to similar models.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: anon-e-mous
Reviews.Content: So far i am quite pleased with my camera. It takes great pictures and is easy to use. Whenever i have technical questions i call Olympus customer service.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: barbie d. "pink country gal"
Reviews.Content: I take a lot of pictures and find this camera just doesn't perform. I hate the delay time when trying to capture the moment. The moment is missed while your still holding down the shutter button (not to mention when holding down the shutter button the camera is in focus mode, at that time when you are looking at your LCD monitor it darkens to the point that you cannot cleary view your image).  I was shocked that my pictures were almost all blurry even though I was completely still at the time of the shot.Also the XD card inserts into the same area of the batteries, a real pain when you want easy access.  Lastly I find the buttons to be very hard to use and inconvient because they are so small (on/off, shooting/switching, playback, etc.) On a postive note. I must say that color of the camera is beautiful. The camera is sleek and attractive, but beauty is NOT a reason for selecting a camera! PERFORMANCE is more important. Sadly I am a dissapointed customer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah S. May
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my granddaughter for Christmas. It is easy to use with a lot of features. She loved the blue color and the large viewing screen. Thanks for such a great product for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed in this camera
Reviews.Author: Rolling Thunder "Krystal"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera based on the performance of my previous camera which I loved, also an Olympus (Camedia D-580).  Big difference.  As reported in other earlier reviews, the pictures from the FE46 are mostly blurry and dark.  It takes so long to automatically focus, that my intended shot of my young grandchildren is often lost.  I have lots of photos of just after the main event, e.g. the blowing out of the candles on a birthday cake.  There was no manual, only a DVD which is inconvenient for me.  The settings are non-intuitive. I emailed Olympus Customer Service to ask for help and was told to put it on 'Animal' setting for photographing children.  It didn't help.  I wish I"d returned it but I kept thinking it was me - that I didn't have it set right.  No amount of settings changes have helped the picture quality.  Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed at all!!!
Reviews.Author: C. Rossouw
Reviews.Content: I am really not at all impressed by the camera, it can take some stunning photo's sometimes and other times it takes horrible shots. I find it tends to blur my photos no matter how stable the camera is and no matter how many photos you take. In the end I have placed this camera in a draw and barely use it as I find I can't rely on it to take great shots.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for every day use!
Reviews.Author: Julie Hermonat "Quality Counts"
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this to any one! Comes with great picture and price! Also has awesome soft were for your pictures!

Reviews.Title: always misses "the  shot"
Reviews.Author: Virginia Reisher "loving mom"
Reviews.Content: This camera while beautiful, is crappy! I recieved it as a gift when i was expecting my 2nd child so that i could capture all the beautiful firsts and precious moments that come along with 2 children.Major dissapointment! This camera takes about 5 seconds to actually take the picture after you push the button. so you never get the shot you intended or aim for. The settings for diffrent lighting situations are useless, they just make the pictures blurry and dark, except the setting for fireworks, that one takes awsome pics! For the most part you use 1 main setting for all situations.As far as battery life goes, i have no idea why with normal use that the camera drains them in roughly 45 min. you cant take this camera to a zoo or amusement park or the beach without at least 3 sets of extra batteries PER DAY! With that being redicoulous, you end up with no pictures of the event you intend to capture. Buy recargable right? Did that, and the camera drains them in 1/2 an hour even when its turned off.  I have little to no good pictures of my 2nd daughters first 9 months because of owning this camera and not having the money to spend on another, untill now!Needless to say I would strongly recommend againts anyone buying this camera and losing out like i have. So i "lost" the camera it and am glad, its a great excuse to buy a real one.I am gonna post the pics if possable of the firework setting because they are truely awsome, and i do understand that not everyone would want a camera for children so if you want a camera for fireworks only id say this is the one if you can deal with the batteries and capture delay.

Reviews.Title: not as good as other models
Reviews.Author: Scott G. Thomas "S, Thomas"
Reviews.Content: I have used two similar models of olympus cameras in the past which both had rechargable batteries. This model used 2 AA batteries. The battery seemed to run out faster than the rechargable ones and there was a much larger delay when taking pictures for this model.

Reviews.Title: Digital camera
Reviews.Author: A. J. Escobar "Albert"
Reviews.Content: I loved the camera its just the stuff i plan to use it for, "Expatiation photos of wildlife" it doesn't have a strong case or programed options to set easily i got this camera a few days ago and i really need to read up on the full use of it but so far its a really fair priced camera and high resolution shots that come along with it.

Reviews.Title: Happy daughter
Reviews.Author: J. Every
Reviews.Content: A birthday present for my 15 year old daughter, and she loves it.  It's rugged, easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Olympus F-46
Reviews.Author: flagirl
Reviews.Content: Having owned an Olympus camera before, I was excited at the prospect of owning a smaller, compact camera, expecting the same quality of pictures I had always enjoyed.  I was so disappointed.  The pictures either come out too dark or too light and most annoying of all--blurry!  I understand the return policy is valid within 30 days of purchase; too bad for me.  I would gladly return it if I could.  Now, I'm stuck with a product I don't like and will have to carry around my old camera if I want good pictures until I can afford to replace this one!

Reviews.Title: not for me
Reviews.Author: Jeanette LaVoy "LaVoix"
Reviews.Content: This sharp little blue camera is thin, easy to lose but not easy to use.  I spent hours trying to set it up (you have to download the manual) and I could not transfer pix easily to my computer via USB port/camera connector and because the CARD is their own couldn't inssert it into camera to download the simple way.I was extremely frustrated over it and send it back.  5-10 years ago it seems like the digital cameras coming out were self explanatory, weightier, less likely to be stolen and did exactly what they claimed, but easily.If you have one and have mastered it - bravo!!Amazon was great about allowing me to return the FE.

Reviews.Title: I Wish Santa Came Back for Returns
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: This was by far my most disappointing camera.  Even if you've never used a camera before and enjoy the easy settings of this one, you should be disgusted by the quality of photos you get.  I get better quality pictures from my 2007 cell phone.  I have an old Samsung with sand inside of it that smudges up the lens yet I still get clearer pictures with that.  No matter the setting, no matter the lighting, no matter the size of the picture the quality is garbage.  It's dark, grainy and unacceptable.  Don't bring this camera to capture any precious memories because you'll regret it at the end of the day.  It may be inexpensive and a gorgeous camera but it's not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it was the lowest cost 12mp camera i could find, and im glad i did, the camera is easy to use, and it takes great pictures which i have downloaded from my camera to my pc (even without the software that came with it) was fast and troublefree, im by far no camera buff, and have read most the reviews on this camera and can say the only thing i noticed was the battery life is not long when you take a bunch of photos back too back, but hey flashights dont last forever either, so i carry extra batteries just in case i need them, all in all this camera is worth what you pay for it. Also i would like too add, when using reviews too make your mind up on a product, dont forget there are thousands of products made everyday of the same product, lemons come with everything we buy, you just have too be one of the people lucky enough not too get one, so dont be so closed minded that the product you buy couldnt possibly have been broken from shipping or handling or whatever, which is what made your experience a bad one instead of a good one....and of course there is always operator error as well. To all those people who bought this camera and got a good deal, thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Great for Close ups
Reviews.Author: Tim Smith "Vaporsdad"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the money easy to use and takes closeups within 4 inches which is great for e-baying!!! I think the people complaining just dont know how to set it right! Another plus is battery life I'm using nmhd rechargebles  and they last a long while. Great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Maruthi Ambati
Reviews.Content: I am not satisfied with this camera. Not good quality. No picture quality. I would return this camera if i have chance now.

Reviews.Title: Not a great bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: Camera Gal
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it would be a great camera being that it was an Olympus and their track record.  At 12mp and 5x zoom I thought I was getting a steal, but I as definitely wrong on that one.  The shots came out blurry even when I wasn't using the zoom feature.  The pictures came out dark or overexposed.  There was no happy medium.  I had the inexpensive Kodak prior to this one and I'm going to buy it again.  If you are looking for an inexpensive digital camera, I would definitely go with the Kodaks.

Reviews.Title: Good on the money
Reviews.Author: Kwesi Moore "moorekwesi"
Reviews.Content: I sent this as a gift and was highly praised. Robust and price-worthy. For the one who wants to keep a memory of his/her life.

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-46 12MP
Reviews.Author: Peter Snow "Peter Snow"
Reviews.Content: The Olympus FE-46 12MP, is a great camera, light and easy to use. I reccomend this camera because is great for in and outdoor pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Dan C.
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera now for a couple of years and it has given excellent service. Shipping was timely and it was received in perfect condition. I would have liked to have a BULB setting like I have with my old 35 mm but this thing takes really good pictures. I like the 12mp because I can zoom in with my computer to see details very clearly. Some settings will not produce true colors with extreme closeups and adjustments have to be made to select the right one for the situation. Overall I am very pleased with the camera. Very good battery life with good disposable batteries.

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: perinna
Reviews.Content: This camera makes kind of yellowish fuzzy pictures. But it was bought for the 10 year old use so as a practice camera it's OK.

Reviews.Title: not soo impressed
Reviews.Author: Jules47
Reviews.Content: I loved my old Olympus but this one rarely takes good pics.  They end up blurry much of the time.  I read the manual online and still was not able to find the right setting.  So I bought a new camera(Kodak)  Much happier

Reviews.Title: Not happy with battery use
Reviews.Author: David Sachs
Reviews.Content: I was lead to believe that it had a single rechargable battery that was not the case I like the camera but hate that it takes AA batteries wouldn't have bought it if I had known!

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Nyron
Reviews.Content: Olympus is a good brand but this series of camera made was i thinke the worst. never focus good despite how much i tweet with it, pictures was ok for 12mp, after a year it stop working,

Reviews.Title: Bad Photo Quality..
Reviews.Author: Joseph Girgis
Reviews.Content: Although it's great in size and design and also i color but the photo quality is not at the same level,hardly to get one in focus,always blurred.I didn't like it,with its price even you can get better one.

Reviews.Title: pink camera
Reviews.Author: slick
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for grand daughter. All is good except it does not take universal disk, so the disk should be included. I have not heard any complaints from her other then that

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: NIKOLOZ BAKRADZE
Reviews.Content: The camera is normal, but the picture quality is poor.The DISCOUNTSJUNGLE send me an used one. do not buy from DiscountsJungle!!!

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-46 12MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: JEFF SMITH "Jeff Smith"
Reviews.Content: A good camera but I bought the wrong one for my wife.  Needs a simpler type if that is possible.Selling it on eBay with extra memory chip, case and battery for same price as camera alone.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Jones
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 3 year old for vacation and because of the price $47@BJ's.  It is far superior than the $39 one I just returned to Walmart which was worst than his toy camera. There is a delay between shooting pictures but I can live with that.  Unless you pay a mint for a camera most digital cameras have a short wait time before shooting the next picture.  I will use Lithium batteries as I always do because they tend to last a lot longer than regular batteries. But overall, I am thrilled with this camera.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: J. Bunch
Reviews.Content: So far we have enjoyed taking pictures with this camera, it has good zoom :)

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Cynthia A. Mccrory
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera, not as small as some but can still fit in a pocket or small purse. The pictures are sharp and it's pretty easy to use (without even reading the instructions!).

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: R. Donovan "rfd"
Reviews.Content: Love the camera itself; especially like edidting it on the camera.  The software is the pits!  According to their cs, it is not user friendly since they had to update it for Vista and the new windows.  I'm spoiled by Kodak where I can send my pics directly to a store to be printed and not waste color ink.  It's a big disappointment!

Reviews.Title: The camera with no directions on how to operate....a waste of my money
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Marks "yorkie lover"
Reviews.Content: This camera is light and small and probably would work well if the directions were easy to find and read.....The other thing I do not like about it is there is no recharagable battery and does not say how many pictures you have taken and how much battery is left...If I understood how to operate it than maybe it would be worth the money....I hate this cameraOlympus FE-46 12MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Light Blue)

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: J. Dominy
Reviews.Content: For the price it is great. A lot of features that are usually offered on higher priced or SLR cameras.  The pics are great and it can be carried in your pocket.  The owners manual could be a little more detailed on how to use certain features.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: RL "R.L."
Reviews.Content: this is a nice little camera.  i got it for my wife to carry around in her purse to catch the pictures for the kids doing something funny.  She has enjoyed it, but it took a little time to get it used to it.  but it a go now.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David Bueltmann
Reviews.Content: I asked my son (a professional photographer) to figure out the best small camera for an old man to work (not a lot of gadgets), but get good quality pictures.  After his research, he suggested this camera.  After I got it he asked if it met my needs.  ABSOLUTELY!  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE46
Reviews.Author: Christopher A. Fankboner "Fankdiesel"
Reviews.Content: Was hoping for better picture quality. Used the camera on a trip to Europe. The camera just didnt seem to take that great of pics. I kept having to try different user modes and still didn't get the quality that I was hoping for. It's decent but not what I had hoped for.

Reviews.Title: Super easy to use
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my parents who are elder, and they find it super easy to use, and that's something because they still cannot use dvd player by themselves. I strongly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael J Hart
Reviews.Content: The camera isn't bad, my only complaint is that the memory card it comes with can't hold alot of pictures (About 6 at 12.1 Megapixels, 22 or so with lower megapixels)

Reviews.Title: I wish it didn't have double AA battery life.
Reviews.Author: ela c. "bargain diva"
Reviews.Content: The color is great, the pictures are ok, but I was disappointed to find that the battery life defends on a AA.

Reviews.Title: Fine camera, but takes forver between photos
Reviews.Author: David J. Berman "D Berm"
Reviews.Content: Ordered the camera because I needed something cheap and this fit the bill.  12 mp for 100 bucks including case and 2 gig chip. The camera works fine and pictures look pretty good.  Major downside is the time between photos.  Its like snap......1.......2........3......4.......5.....snap.  Its a long time.  Probably wouldve spend the extra 20 bucks and gotten something different

Reviews.Title: Not Very Good
Reviews.Author: Jehad Imlawi
Reviews.Content: it is good but not that much, my friend have casio which is much cheaper but its picture is much better, I am not sure if there is chance to enhance the quality of its picture using its setting, but I tried.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Degreen
Reviews.Content: First digital camera we have owned...was going to go with a higher end SLR, but after reading the reviews and personal reccomendations from friends got this. Takes really amazing pictures and is easy to use once you read the instructions and mess around with it a little.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Connie Sumer "Midtown Mom"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is cute and compact.  Everyone who see's it say they love it, too.  The only thing is the instructions are not very detailed. Overall, you get a great bang for your buck!

Reviews.Title: Great low cost camera
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: I was hoping to get a Canon but couldn't afford it at the time so, I got this Olympus FE-46 instead.  I can't complain, it's a great 5X zoom 12 MP camera at a very low cost.  I didn't expect to like it as much :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for non-professionals
Reviews.Author: Shyamal Gupta "esgee"
Reviews.Content: Great product. And price ! At 12 megapixels and 5X optical zoom, it's wonderful for non-professionals who simply want good pictures. A great plus for me is that it uses AA batteries.The battery and memory card compartment could have been better designed.But overall, it's a great buy !

Reviews.Title: Olympus buttons stopped working within 90 days of purchase
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: Well, somehow after I tried to download pictures to my computer with a usb cord (which did not work btw), the buttons on the camera no longer work at all.  Only power-on and power-off, no ability to take pictures.I contacted olympus customer support, and only received a terse "send it in for repair" email.I am disappointed that it took 2 weeks for Olympus to give me this lame response.And I am disappointed the camera is no longer working so soon after purchase.I thought it was a good deal, but am disappointed.  Would recommend staying away from Olympus brand if they do not provide quality support.

Reviews.Title: blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: D. Bernardino "cloud mix"
Reviews.Content: i really didn't like this camera, blurry pictures and dark....i'll give it to my son...

Reviews.Title: Real Nice Camera!
Reviews.Author: B52EW "Looking for a Deal"
Reviews.Content: The price was right and the camera is great. All for under $100. Highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Light Blue color & Amazing Quality
Reviews.Author: SMD
Reviews.Content: It is beautiful and powerful. It has a beautiful light blue color, and it is really easy to use. The features are amazing. There are categories to take photos of food, in dark settings, action settings, etc. It has a nice 5x zoom. I have other Olympus cameras and I am very happy with the quality. I take a lot of photos and never had a problem.

Reviews.Title: I guess its okay for the price
Reviews.Author: lazy yet not
Reviews.Content: I didnt expect much considering the price of the camera but I at least expected a rechargeable battery. All the money you save on this camera, you end up spending anyway (on disposable batteries). By the way it also does not take video. I didnt think I would get a top of the line camera but I expected better than this.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for kids
Reviews.Author: L. Hayes
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old son.  He's always using my phone to take pictures to entertain himself while at his brothers' soccer games.  Now, he has his own camera to use.  It's perfect for an 8 year old or even an older chld/teen.  It's easy to use & produces great photos.  We haven't had any pictures printed, but the photos look great on the computer.  I think it's a great value!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: rockadoodle "Rockadoodle fan"
Reviews.Content: Good seller, bad camera. The pictures are not that good. I would think that with all that zoom you would have great pictures but not really.

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-46 Being Returned
Reviews.Author: Nana B. "novice photographer"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Olympus FE-46 camera as a XMAS present to myself as I had a previous Olympus camera which was easy to use both on camera and on computer.  This one, however, is so difficult to operate and understand that I have decided to return it immediately.  Even though I am pretty "computer-literate", the instructions were way beyond me - I don't recommend it to anyone who needs a simple camera which can easily be used and then have the pictures transferred to computer.  I was so frustrated trying to understand all the complicated instructions, that it wasn't going to be any fun to use!

Reviews.Title: Good Deal in Good Price!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Peeyush Tak
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.This i bought for my wife she really like it.Thats all i want to say for this camera....Good Deal in Good price.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Theresa L. Smith
Reviews.Content: I can't tell how it works because you are only able to take 3 pictures until you buy a memory card; a product that you can't use out of the box is worthless.  So, hopefully, I can go purchase a memory card and then see how the camera operates.  I think it is really poor planning and rude that you can't even use the camera out of the box.  What's the point of that!?  So, I hope after all the frustration, it works at all!

Reviews.Title: Exellent product i like it
Reviews.Content: Olympus FE-46 12MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Pearl White)

ProductInfo.Features:
12-megapixel resolution for photo-quality prints up to 20 x 30 inches
5x optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD
AF Tracking technology; choose from three in-camera Magic Filters
Edit images in-camera; Red-Eye Fix, Lighting Fix, Resizing and Cropping
Capture images to xD-Picture Card or microSD (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-46 12MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Light Blue)
